laboratory_examinations.findings: STREPTOCOCCUS ANGINOSUS (MILLERI) GROUP, MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA

findings.liver: Normal in shape and contour, no lesions.
findings.spleen: Upper limits of normal size at approximately 14 cm.
findings.kidneys: Normal size with perinephric fat stranding
findings.appendix: Diameter at upper limits of normal, measuring 7 mm with fluid.
findings.fluid_collection: Decreased size from 92 x 37 mm to 69 x 25 mm; previous CT comparison indicates decrease in size of multiple interloop fluid collections.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluid collection decreased in size; specific measurements provided.
